mapper.select: select dn.NAME,cast(pv.VALUE as DECIMAL(5,2)) VALUE from panelvalues pv, (select * from banks where NAME='工商银行') banks, (select * from datanames where id in (20,4,22,30)) dn,valuedates vd where pv.did=dn.id and pv.vid=vd.id and pv.bid=banks.id;
select dn.NAME,CAST(bv.VALUE AS DECIMAL(5,2)) VALUE from barvalues bv,banks,datanames dn,valuedates vd where bv.did=dn.id and bv.vid=vd.id and bv.bid=banks.id;
select dn.NAME,pv.VALUE from pievalues pv,banks,datanames dn,valuedates vd where pv.did=dn.id and pv.vid=vd.id and pv.bid=banks.id and vd.valuedate REGEXP '^2020';

select dn.NAME,CAST(lv.VALUE AS DECIMAL(4,1)) VALUE,vd.valuedate from linevalues lv, (select * from banks where NAME="工商银行") banks, (select * from datanames where id in (1,18)) dn, (select * from valuedates where valuedate REGEXP '2020') vd where lv.did=dn.id and lv.vid=vd.id and lv.bid=banks.id;

select dn.NAME,CAST(rv.VALUE AS DECIMAL(3,0))VALUE,b.NAME bank from (select rv.VALUE,rv.did,rv.vid,rv.bid from radarvalues rv where (1,2,18,21,23)) rv, (select * from banks where NAME in ("中国银行","工商银行","建设银行","农业银行")) b, valuedates vd,datanames dn where rv.did=dn.id and rv.vid=vd.id and rv.bid=b.id;
select dn.NAME NAME,pv.VALUE value,jd.NAME time from peizhivalues pv,jidu jd,banks,datanames dn where pv.jid=jd.id and pv.bid=banks.id and pv.did=dn.id;

select bb.NAME company,CAST(mv1.VALUE AS DECIMAL(4,1)) zbczl,CAST(mv2.VALUE AS DECIMAL(4,1)) hxzbczl,CAST(mv3.VALUE AS DECIMAL(4,1)) zblrl,CAST(mv4.VALUE AS DECIMAL(4,1)) ldxbl from (select VALUE,bid from entryvalues where did=1) mv1, (select VALUE,bid from entryvalues where did=18) mv2, (select VALUE,bid from entryvalues where did=21) mv3, (select VALUE,bid from entryvalues where did=23) mv4, banks bb where bb.id=mv1.bid and bb.id=mv2.bid and bb.id=mv3.bid and bb.id=mv4.bid;

select REPLACE(bb.NAME,'分行','') province,CAST(mv1.VALUE AS DECIMAL(4,1)) zbczl,CAST(mv2.VALUE AS DECIMAL(4,1)) hxzbczl,CAST(mv3.VALUE AS DECIMAL(4,1)) zblrl,CAST(mv4.VALUE AS DECIMAL(4,1)) ldxbl,CAST(mv5.VALUE AS DECIMAL(4,1)) hxyjzbczl from (select VALUE,bbid from mapvalues where did=1) mv1, (select VALUE,bbid from mapvalues where did=18) mv2, (select VALUE,bbid from mapvalues where did=21) mv3, (select VALUE,bbid from mapvalues where did=23) mv4, (select VALUE,bbid from mapvalues where did=2) mv5, branchbanks bb where bb.id=mv1.bbid and bb.id=mv2.bbid and bb.id=mv3.bbid and bb.id=mv4.bbid and bb.id=mv5.bbid;
select dn.NAME,rv.VALUE value from riskvalues rv,datanames dn where rv.did=dn.id;
